14#include <config.h>
15
16#include <stdbool.h>
17#include <stdlib.h>
18#include <stdarg.h>
19
20#include <isc/base32.h>
21#include <isc/buffer.h>
22#include <isc/commandline.h>
23#include <isc/file.h>
24#include <isc/hex.h>
25#include <isc/iterated_hash.h>
26#include <isc/print.h>
27#include <isc/result.h>
28#include <isc/string.h>
29#include <isc/types.h>
30#include <isc/util.h>
31
32#include <dns/fixedname.h>
33#include <dns/name.h>
34#include <dns/nsec3.h>
35#include <dns/types.h>
36
37const char *program = "nsec3hash";
38
39ISC_PLATFORM_NORETURN_PRE static void
40fatal(const char *format, ...) ISC_PLATFORM_NORETURN_POST;
41
42static void
43fatal(const char *format, ...) {
44 va_list args;
45
46 fprintf(stderr, "%s: ", program);
47 va_start(args, format);
48 vfprintf(stderr, format, args);
49 va_end(args);
50 fprintf(stderr, "\n");
51 exit(1);
52}
53
54static void
55check_result(isc_result_t result, const char *message) {
56 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
57 fatal("%s: %s", message, isc_result_totext(result));
58}
59
60static void
61usage(void) {
62 fprintf(stderr, "Usage: %s salt algorithm iterations domain\n",
63 program);
64 fprintf(stderr, " %s -r algorithm flags iterations salt domain\n",
65 program);
66 exit(1);
67}
68
69typedef void nsec3printer(unsigned algo, unsigned flags, unsigned iters,
70 const char *saltstr, const char *domain,
71 const char *digest);
72
73static void
74nsec3hash(nsec3printer *nsec3print, const char *algostr, const char *flagstr,
75 const char *iterstr, const char *saltstr, const char *domain)
76{
77 dns_fixedname_t fixed;
78 dns_name_t *name;
79 isc_buffer_t buffer;
80 isc_region_t region;
81 isc_result_t result;
82 unsigned char hash[NSEC3_MAX_HASH_LENGTH];
83 unsigned char salt[DNS_NSEC3_SALTSIZE];
84 unsigned char text[1024];
85 unsigned int hash_alg;
86 unsigned int flags;
87 unsigned int length;
88 unsigned int iterations;
89 unsigned int salt_length;
90 const char dash[] = "-";
91
92 if (strcmp(saltstr, "-") == 0) {
93 salt_length = 0;
94 salt[0] = 0;
95 } else {
96 isc_buffer_init(&buffer, salt, sizeof(salt));
97 result = isc_hex_decodestring(saltstr, &buffer);
98 check_result(result, "isc_hex_decodestring(salt)");
99 salt_length = isc_buffer_usedlength(&buffer);
100 if (salt_length > DNS_NSEC3_SALTSIZE)
101 fatal("salt too long");
102 if (salt_length == 0)
103 saltstr = dash;
104 }
105 hash_alg = atoi(algostr);
106 if (hash_alg > 255U)
107 fatal("hash algorithm too large");
108 flags = flagstr == NULL ? 0 : atoi(flagstr);
109 if (flags > 255U)
110 fatal("flags too large");
111 iterations = atoi(iterstr);
112 if (iterations > 0xffffU)
113 fatal("iterations to large");
114
115 name = dns_fixedname_initname(&fixed);
116 isc_buffer_constinit(&buffer, domain, strlen(domain));
117 isc_buffer_add(&buffer, strlen(domain));
118 result = dns_name_fromtext(name, &buffer, dns_rootname, 0, NULL);
119 check_result(result, "dns_name_fromtext() failed");
120
121 dns_name_downcase(name, name, NULL);
122 length = isc_iterated_hash(hash, hash_alg, iterations, salt,
123 salt_length, name->ndata, name->length);
124 if (length == 0)
125 fatal("isc_iterated_hash failed");
126 region.base = hash;
127 region.length = length;
128 isc_buffer_init(&buffer, text, sizeof(text));
129 isc_base32hexnp_totext(&region, 1, "", &buffer);
130 isc_buffer_putuint8(&buffer, '\0');
131
132 nsec3print(hash_alg, flags, iterations, saltstr, domain, (char *)text);
133}
134
135static void
136nsec3hash_print(unsigned algo, unsigned flags, unsigned iters,
137 const char *saltstr, const char *domain, const char *digest)
138{
139 UNUSED(flags);
140 UNUSED(domain);
141
142 fprintf(stdout, "%s (salt=%s, hash=%u, iterations=%u)\n",
143 digest, saltstr, algo, iters);
144}
145
146static void
147nsec3hash_rdata_print(unsigned algo, unsigned flags, unsigned iters,
148 const char *saltstr, const char *domain,
149 const char *digest)
150{
151 fprintf(stdout, "%s NSEC3 %u %u %u %s %s\n",
152 domain, algo, flags, iters, saltstr, digest);
153}
154
155int
156main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
157 bool rdata_format = false;
158 int ch;
159
160 while ((ch = isc_commandline_parse(argc, argv, "-r")) != -1) {
161 switch (ch) {
162 case 'r':
163 rdata_format = true;
164 break;
165 case '-':
166 isc_commandline_index -= 1;
167 goto skip;
168 default:
169 break;
170 }
171 }
172
173 skip:
174 argc -= isc_commandline_index;
175 argv += isc_commandline_index;
176
177 if (rdata_format) {
178 if (argc != 5) {
179 usage();
180 }
181 nsec3hash(nsec3hash_rdata_print,
182 argv[0], argv[1], argv[2], argv[3], argv[4]);
183 } else {
184 if (argc != 4) {
185 usage();
186 }
187 nsec3hash(nsec3hash_print,
188 argv[1], NULL, argv[2], argv[0], argv[3]);
189 }
190 return(0);
191}
